name: multi-language-code-reviewer
description: A Claude Code skill that automatically validates and fixes code quality issues in git changed files using language-specific linters. Supports JavaScript/TypeScript/Vue (ESLint), Python (pylint/flake8/black), Java (checkstyle/spotbugs/pmd), Go (golangci-lint/gofmt), and Rust (clippy/rustfmt). Automatically detects file types and applies the appropriate validator.
